title: 360.89 ENFORCEMENT.
text: In addition to any other remedy, the commissioner may institute in any court of competent jurisdiction an action to prevent, restrain, correct, or abate any violation of the provisions of sections 360.81 to 360.91 or of any rules or orders of the commissioner issued pursuant thereto. The court may grant such relief, by way of injunction or otherwise, as may be necessary under sections 360.81 to 360.91 and the rules and orders of the commissioner issued pursuant thereto.
